    question => string (368) "<p>8. Confirm that provisions have only been recognised when:</p> <ul> <li>a...
    $value[7]['question']
    <p>8.	Confirm that provisions have only been recognised when:</p>
<ul>
    <li>an entity has a present obligation as a result of a past event; and</li>
    <li>it is probable that a transfer of economic benefits is required to settle the obligation; and</li>
    <li>a reliable estimate can be made of the amount of the obligation. <strong>(P)</strong></li>
</ul>

    question => string (471) "<p>9. Confirm that contingent liabilities have been disclosed when:</p> <ul>...
    $value[8]['question']
    <p>9.	Confirm that contingent liabilities have been disclosed when:</p>
<ul>
    <li>an entity has a present obligation as a result of a past event; and</li>
    <li>it is probable that a transfer of economic benefits is required to settle the obligation, however a reliable estimate cannot be made of the amount of the obligation; or</li>
    <li>it is only possible (but not remote) that a transfer of economic benefits is required.<strong> (P)</strong></li>
</ul>

    question => string (467) "<p>14. Ascertain whether all necessary provisions have been made and conting...
    $value[13]['question']
    <p>14.	Ascertain whether all necessary provisions have been made and contingencies disclosed by considering, for example:</p>
<ul>
    <li>litigation and claims ;</li>
    <li>deferred tax (see the J Section);</li>
    <li>dilapidations;</li>
    <li>product warranty provisions</li>
    <li>rectification provisions (see the E Section);</li>
    <li>onerous contracts; and</li>
    <li>pension commitments.  <strong>(C, P)</strong></li>
    <li></li>
</ul>

    <p>20.	Enquire into the existence of any forward exchange contracts.     $value[20]['question']
    <p>21.	Enquire into the existence of non-basic financial instruments (other than forward exchange contracts, non-basic bank loans and interest rate swaps). Where they exist obtain a counterparty valuation and then obtain an expert valuation and complete the relevant tests on the N audit programme.  Ensure that an appropriate liability or asset has been recognised and complete the hedging audit programme where the client has opted to hedge account.  <strong>(P, E,C)</strong></p>
